oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Video recording of a service opening with a sermon by Junior McCormick. After a brief speech to the congregation, he leads the congregation in song as Billy Lemming plays guitar. Billy Lemming plays and sings after McCormick finishes his own songs. As Lemming plays and sings, Junior McCormick takes up and handles a serpent in a fairly aggressive manner as he praises God, and preaches. The video focuses in on McCormick as he handles, providing a good view. While others sing, McCormick taunts the snake with a wallet and gets it to strike. When it does, he becomes much more aggressive with the snake as he handles. He puts the serpent back in its box and the film cuts to Junior McCormick preaching at the pulpit. Billy Lemming testifies thereafter on the validity of the signs. While he speaks, he picks up a jar of strychnine and handles fire from a bottle with kerosene.
